quotes.quote: A woman is helpless only when her nail polish is drying.
Nail polish is like the icing on the beauty cake.
Nothing improves your mood like a new manicure.
It is not just nail art. It is ART.
There were two kinds of women: those who wear nail polish and those who don't. Which do you prefer?
Life just wouldn't be the same if we didn't have nail polish.
Great nails don't happen by chance they happen by appointment.
You can't buy happiness, but you can buy nail polish and that's kind the same thing.
When life gets tough there's always nail polish.
When life gives you nail polishes, make nail art.
Nude nail polish wins hands down over intricate nail art.
Nail polish speaks louder than words.
Life is too short to wear boring nail polish.
